title: First Law of Thermo - Do work on a system

content.question: A sample of ideal gas is in a container with a movable piston. During a time interval, the piston does <math alttext="7.0 kilojoules" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mtext>7.0</mtext><mspace width="0.2em"></mspace><mtext>kJ</mtext></mstyle></math> of work on the gas and <math alttext="1.5 kilojoules" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mtext>1.5</mtext><mspace width="0.2em"></mspace><mtext>kJ</mtext></mstyle></math> of energy transfers out of the container by a cooling process. Which of the following best approximates the change in the internal energy of the gas during this process?
